sailpoint.object
Class UIPreferences

java.lang.Object
  sailpoint.tools.xml.AbstractXmlObject
      sailpoint.object.SailPointObject
          sailpoint.object.UIPreferences
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, sailpoint.tools.xml.PersistentXmlObject, sailpoint.tools.xml.XMLReferenceTarget
public class UIPreferences
extends SailPointObject

An object encapsulating various UI preferences associated with an identity.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

PRF_DASHBOARD

public static final java.lang.String PRF_DASHBOARD
The names of the dashboard related preferences. These strings are used as key values in the preference map to pull the preference objects out of the Identity.

See Also:

PRF_CERTIFICATION_SUMMARY_DISPLAY_MINIMIZED

public static final java.lang.String PRF_CERTIFICATION_SUMMARY_DISPLAY_MINIMIZED
Certification Summary section in certification ui as expanded or collapsed. This is persisted based on what the user does.

PRF_CERTIFICATION_DETAILED_VIEW_FILTER_SET

PRF_CERT_PAGE_LIST_ITEMS

public static final java.lang.String PRF_CERT_PAGE_LIST_ITEMS
Preference that contains a boolean as to whether to default to the item view or the entity view on the certification page.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PRF_DISPLAY_ENTITLEMENT_DESC

public static final java.lang.String PRF_DISPLAY_ENTITLEMENT_DESC
Indicates whether the user wants to by default view entitlement descriptions as opposed to entitlement names in places like the certification identity view.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PRF_GRID_STATES

public static final java.lang.String PRF_GRID_STATES
Preference that contains a list of gridstates for a user. This stores their preferences for how they want their grids displayed.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PRF_EXT_STATES

public static final java.lang.String PRF_EXT_STATES
Preference that contains a list of states for ext-based components

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PRF_ADV_SEARCH_ITEMS

public static final java.lang.String PRF_ADV_SEARCH_ITEMS
The String used to identify the list of search filters stored on the user's preferences for use with the advanced identity search.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

PREFERENCE_NAMES

public static final java.lang.String[] PREFERENCE_NAMES
An array of all known UI preference names. This is temporary for the upgrader so things can be copied from the old preferences map to a new UIPreferences object. Once the upgrade has been done this is no longer needed.

hasName

public boolean hasName()
Description copied from class: SailPointObject
Return true if the object has a name. This is used by the AbstractSailPointObject and the PersistenceManagers to tell if the name can be used in a search filter.

It is almost always true, but a few classes like log records do not have meaningful names. Consider using ObjectUtil.hasName(SailPointContext, Class) instead

Overrides:
hasName in class SailPointObject

hasAssignedScope

public boolean hasAssignedScope()
Description copied from class: SailPointObject
A few SailPointObjects do not have assigned scopes. They should override this to return false if they do not.

Overrides:
hasAssignedScope in class SailPointObject

replace

public void replace(UIPreferences src)
Used by the preferences UI to assimilate a transient object maintained on the HttpSession back into the a fresh object fetched from the repo. Cannot just replace the object reference without hitting "object in sessioN more than once" mess.
